name: Project L.U.A.
description:
In this game, it's the future and a large alien war has devastated several planets, launched asteroids and wreckage toward Earth. The leaders of the Terran nations came together to create Project L.U.A. (Lunar Ultimate Aid) to protect Earth from the various threats that were to come.

In Project L.U.A, you have control of several new technologies that have been implemented on a lunar base to defend Earth and the Moon itself.

"Project L.U.A." is a project made for a Games Workshop discipline at Unisinos Campus Porto Alegre in 2017.
